name.description: Name given to the current pipeline.

connection.description: Connection details used when instantiating a kafka connection.

supportedTypes.description: List of types supported by K2K.

url.description: Url used to connect to the schema registry

cacheSize.description: Maximum number of of schemas that can be cached by K2K.

config.description: Configuration keys for the schema registry client.

headers.description: Additional http headers to be included when calling the Schema Registry.

consumer.description: Configuration used by consumer reading control data from target cluster.

assignment.description: Configuration for partition assignment module when using exactly once.

graceWindow.description: Time to wait before the application actively fences off other applications.

fencingMaxParallelism.description: Controls the max parallelism when fencing slow/zombie producers.

commit.description: Configuration used by offset commit module.

batchSize.description: Maximum number of records to be sent in one go to the target cluster's consumer.

syncTimeout.description: Max amount of time to wait when attempting to determine the last committed offset for a group.

topic.description: Topic used to publish messages pertaining to offset commits.

batchTimeout.description: Maximum amount of time to wait for the batch limit to be reached before sending the current batch to the target cluster's consumer.

group.description: Name used by K2K when committing offsets as well as when determining the last committed offsets for the group.

autoCreateTopics.description: Toggles auto creation of replicated topics in the target cluster.

partition.description: Name used by the header used to inject the source partition number.

offset.description: Name used by the header used to inject the source offset.

topic.description: Name used by the header used to inject the source topic name.

pipeline.description: Name used by the header used to inject the pipeline's name.

optimizeCommitPartition.description: Toggles optimization where a single partition per consumer group is used when publishing control messages.

autoCreateControlTopics.description: Toggles auto creation of k2k internal topics.

validateControlTopicSettings.description: Toggles validation that verifies if the necessary control topics are present in the target cluster before K2K starts.

token.description: Accepts the EULA for K2K. This must be set to true in order to run K2K.

acceptEula.description: Accepts the EULA for K2K. This must be set to true in order to run K2K.

partition.description: Strategy to be used when assigning a topic to a replicated record.

topic.description: Strategy to be used when assigning a topic to a replicated record.

prefix.description: Defines a prefix to be prepended to the source topic name when determining the record's target topic name.

suffix.description: Defines a suffix to be appended to the source topic name when determining the record's target topic name.

static.description: Defines the name of the topic record's will be routed towards.

staticMapping.description: Defines a set of rules to determine a record's target topic based on the source topic's name.

headers.description: Header configuration to be used when tracing headers are enabled.

partition.description: Name used by the header used to inject the source partition number.

offset.description: Name used by the header used to inject the source offset.

topic.description: Name used by the header used to inject the source topic name.

pipeline.description: Name used by the header used to inject the pipeline's name.

onCommitSyncTimeout.description: Defines the error handling strategy to be used when K2K is not able to deserialize a control message.

onControlMessageDeserializationError.description: Defines the error handling strategy to be used when K2K is not able to deserialize a control message.

configuration.description: Assorted parameters that can be used to configure K2K.

autoControlTopicCreationCheckDelay.description: How many times K2K should try to assert that a topic it created is present in the cluster before giving up.

autoControlTopicCreationMaxAttempts.description: How many times K2K should try to assert that a topic it created is present in the cluster before giving up.

topicCreation.description: Configuration for the auto creation of topics.

replication.description: Configuration for auto-creation of control topics.

common.description: Specific rules to be applied to all auto-created replicated topics.

partitions.description: Default t countopic partition count to be used when auto-creating a topic.

replication.description: Default topic replication to be used when auto-creating topics.

config.description: Default topic configuration to be used when auto-creating a topic.

rules.description: Specific rules to be applied to all auto-created replicated topics.

pattern.description: Properties to be used when auto creating topics matched by this rule.

properties.description: Properties to be used when auto creating topics matched by this rule.

partitions.description: Default t countopic partition count to be used when auto-creating a topic.

replication.description: Default topic replication to be used when auto-creating topics.

config.description: Default topic configuration to be used when auto-creating a topic.

control.description: Configuration for auto-creation of control topics.

common.description: Common configuration to be used when creating control topics.

partitions.description: Default t countopic partition count to be used when auto-creating a topic.

replication.description: Default topic replication to be used when auto-creating topics.

config.description: Default topic configuration to be used when auto-creating a topic.

assignment.description: Configuration used when auto-creating the assignment control topic.

partitions.description: Default t countopic partition count to be used when auto-creating a topic.

replication.description: Default topic replication to be used when auto-creating topics.

config.description: Default topic configuration to be used when auto-creating a topic.

commit.description: Configuration used when auto-creating the offset control topic.

partitions.description: Default t countopic partition count to be used when auto-creating a topic.

replication.description: Default topic replication to be used when auto-creating topics.

config.description: Default topic configuration to be used when auto-creating a topic.

metrics.description: Configuration used when auto-creating the metrics control topic.

partitions.description: Default t countopic partition count to be used when auto-creating a topic.

replication.description: Default topic replication to be used when auto-creating topics.

config.description: Default topic configuration to be used when auto-creating a topic.

connection.description: Connection details used when instantiating a kafka connection.

supportedTypes.description: List of types supported by K2K.

url.description: Url used to connect to the schema registry

cacheSize.description: Maximum number of of schemas that can be cached by K2K.

config.description: Configuration keys for the schema registry client.

headers.description: Additional http headers to be included when calling the Schema Registry.

prefix.description: Configuration used when publishing metrics to kafka.

sourceConsumer.description: Prefix added to metrics concerning the consumer instantiated against the source cluster.

targetConsumer.description: Prefix added to metrics concerning the consumer instantiated against the target cluster.

targetProducer.description: Prefix added to metrics concerning the producer instantiated against the target cluster.

assignment.description: Prefix added to metrics concerning the assignment process (assigned topics, partitions,...)

kafka.description: Configuration used when publishing metrics to kafka.
